title: Sunset Landscape
description: A watercolor painting of a peaceful sunset over rolling hills. This piece captures the warm colors of dusk with soft brushstrokes and gentle gradients.

title: Portrait Sketch
description: A charcoal portrait study focusing on facial expressions and emotional depth. Created during a live model session.

title: Abstract Composition
description: An experimental piece using mixed media techniques. Explores the relationship between color, texture, and form in abstract space.

title: Floral Study
description: Detailed botanical illustration of spring flowers. Created with colored pencils on textured paper, emphasizing realistic detail.

title: Urban Skyline
description: Digital artwork depicting a modern city skyline at night. Created using digital painting techniques with focus on lighting and atmosphere.
